text:
Great to see the Pfizer & BioNTech #COVID19 #vaccine trial published (@NEJM). Over ~2 months, two vaccines reduced symptomatic COVID19 in adults as follows:

🔸Absolute risk reduction for an indivudal = 0.68%

🔹Relative risk reduction  =95.7%
▪️ Numbers needed to vaccinate 147 https://t.co/5uwbe3B71J
